title: Authors and Citation

what: A iteratively bifurcated clustering strategy for single-cell sequencing data
title: A iteratively bifurcated clustering strategy for single-cell sequencing data
text: iteratively bifurcated clustering method single-cell sequencing Version: 0.4.9 Depends: R(>=3.6) Import packages: stats, utils, Seurat, dplyr, clustree, ggplot2, ComplexHeatmap, RColorBrewer, circlize, fastcluster, parallelDist, HiClimR, clusterProfiler, org.Hs.eg.db, org.Mm.eg.db, Hmisc, stringr, cowplot, plyr Citation: submitted….

title: A iteratively bifurcated clustering strategy for single-cell sequencing data
code: requiredPackages = c('stats','utils','Seurat','dplyr','clustree','ggplot2','RColorBrewer','circlize','fastcluster',                      'parallelDist','HiClimR','Hmisc','stringr','cowplot','plyr') for(p in requiredPackages){   if(!require(p,character.only = TRUE)) install.packages(p)   library(p,character.only = TRUE) } if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))     install.packages("BiocManager")  BiocManager::install('ComplexHeatmap','clusterProfiler','org.Hs.eg.db','org.Mm.eg.db') install.packages(c('Seurat', 'dplyr', 'clustree', 'ggplot2',  'RColorBrewer', 'circlize', 'fastcluster', 'parallelDist', 'HiClimR', 'Hmisc', 'cowplot', 'plyr'))  if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))     install.packages("BiocManager") BiocManager::install(c('ComplexHeatmap', 'clusterProfiler', 'org.Hs.eg.db', 'org.Mm.eg.db'))

what: The main function to perform iteratively bifurcation clustering — RunBt2m
title: The main function to perform iteratively bifurcation clustering — RunBt2m
text: main function perform iteratively bifurcation clustering

title: The main function to perform iteratively bifurcation clustering — RunBt2m
code: RunBt2m(   seuratObj,   method = "graph",   min.marker.num = 100,   max.level.num = 20,   min.cell.count = 50,   resolution.sets = 30,   verbose = T )

title: The main function to perform iteratively bifurcation clustering — RunBt2m
text: seuratObj Seurat object method method perform bifurcation clustering "graph (default), hclust kmeans" min.marker.num Minimal number markers confirm bifurcation max.level.num Maximum number level bifurcation min.cell.count Minimal number cells perform bifurcation (must bigger PC number: 50) resolution.sets number resolution searching verbose Print detail proccessing messages

title: The main function to perform iteratively bifurcation clustering — RunBt2m
text: list. cellMeta contains preliminary bifurcation level marker_chain contains significant markers cluster bifucation contains bifurcation details (parent, child1, child2)
